name: Mamaloaco's Frigid Rain
title: Citlali: Mamaloaco's Frigid Rain
in_play_description: After your opponent is affected by Frozen or Melt: +1 to your next 2 instances of Hydro DMG and Pyro DMG dealt, and Citlali gains 1 Nightsoul point. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Citlali to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
After your opponent takes DMG from Frozen or Melt: +1 to your next 2 instances of Hydro DMG and Pyro DMG dealt, and Citlali gains 1 Nightsoul point. (Once per Round)
(You must have Citlali in your deck to add this card to your deck)
